abstract: Sacramento Kings sign forward Caron Butler to two-year, $3 million contract with player option in second season; other basketball news noted.
lead_paragraph: The Sacramento Kings have signed the veteran forward Caron Butler to a two-year, $3 million contract with a player option in the second season.
snippet: The Sacramento Kings have signed the veteran forward Caron Butler to a two-year, $3 million contract with a player option in the second season.
